block1.p: Red grapes are high in bioflavonoids which will enhance immune function. Fruits and vegetables contain bioflavonoids, antioxidants, vitamin C, carotenes, and minerals, all of which help your immune system. The fiber in produce reduces stress on the digestive system and helps to bring dysbiosis under control.

image.alt: Fruits and Vegetables at a produce market

block2.p: Your practitioner will discuss water quality and quantity with you.

image.alt: A woman drinking a glass of water
